American Reading Company | Full Stack Developer - Ed Tech | King of Prussia, PA | FULL-TIME ONSITE

At American Reading Company, we create content, build tools, and provide training to help students become avid readers and learners. Educational technology, including web and mobile applications, are crucial to our daily operations.

We're looking for a full stack developer who will build web applications that will enable school and district administrators to learn and collaborate together while implementing our literacy solutions. These powerful tools will live inside our widely-used, proven technology platform, SchoolPace.

Our ed-tech software is envisioned, developed, and supported in-house. If you have the skillset for this unique opportunity, you'll be able to work with an amazing team of expert educators and developers.
